original_title: Le jour où le fils de Raïner s'est noyé
overview: Night falls slowly… The inhabitants of the village have found the body of Rainer's youngest son, drowned in a river. In front of the family home, through a window, the villagers observe Rainer and the rest of the family seated peacefully in the parlor. Who will give them the terrible news?
title: The Day When Raïner's Son Drowned
